port.description: Port number where the control panel will bind.

mongodbUrl.description: Url of the MongoDB to use.

queueLevelDetectorPort.description: Port where to receive the output of the queue level detector application.

numberPlateRecognitionPort.description: Port where to receive the output of the automotive number plate recognition application.

parkingSensorsPort.description: Port where to receive the output of the parking sensors application.
